perturbation.changed_text:
1.1  The following words shall have the following meanings throughout this Agreement:
b)     "Freight" means any items for transport;

1.2     All references to currency in this Agreement shall be to Canadian currency, unless otherwise indicated.

1.3     All references to days in this Agreement are references to calendar days unless the reference is to business days, in which case business days shall be interpreted as business days as designated in the Province of Ontario.
perturbation.explanation: The definition of "Agreement" and "Force Majeure" was removed, but subsequent clauses (e.g. 24.2) still refer to the attached Schedules and Force Majeure. This creates an internal contradiction as these terms are used but never defined, creating uncertainty as to which schedules are under consideration or what constitutes Force Majeure.

perturbation.original_text:
3.4     Each Party agrees to provide the services outlined above at an on time         performance level of no less than ninety percent (90%) of the scheduled         delivery time, excluding delays caused by the other Party or events of          Force Majeure. Monthly, the performance level shall be measured as set          out above. Failure to provide services as set out herein constitutes a          Monthly Service Failure.

3.5     Except for the joint marketing efforts referred to in Section 3.1 (v)         above, Purolator agrees not to directly or indirectly solicit next day         or multiple day freight from existing sameday customers of Dynamex.             4 3.6    Except for the joint marketing efforts referred to in Section 3.1 (v)        above, Dynamex agrees not to directly or indirectly solicit overnight        freight from customers of Purolator.
perturbation.changed_text:
3.4     Each Party agrees to provide the services outlined above at a reasonable on time performance level. Failure to provide services as set out herein constitutes a Service Failure.

3.5     Except for the joint marketing efforts referred to in Section 3.1 (v) above, Purolator agrees not to directly or indirectly solicit next day or multiple day freight from existing sameday customers of Dynamex. 4 3.6    Except for the joint marketing efforts referred to in Section 3.1 (v) above, Dynamex agrees not to directly or indirectly solicit overnight freight from customers of Purolator.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the specified 90% on-time performance, a clear objective measure is lost. Although 'reasonable on time performance level' and 'Service Failure' are still mentioned, the absence of a quantifiable metric creates ambiguity and makes it difficult to enforce these stipulations with precision, leading to potential disputes and uncertainties.

perturbation.changed_text:
4.1    Subject to all other terms and conditions of this Agreement, Purolator shall pay to Dynamex rates to be determined.

4.2    Subject to all other terms and conditions of this Agreement, Dynamex shall pay to Purolator rates to be determined.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the reference to Schedules D and E (and not providing an alternative), the contract now lacks specific rate information. However, subsequent sections, such as Section 5.0 (Payment Procedures) still reference invoices for services rendered and payment terms, which is impossible without defined rates. This creates a clear internal contradiction, as the contract implies financial obligations without outlining the rates that dictate those obligations.
